meanings.sent1: She minueted gracefully at the ball.
meanings.sent2: They minueted together in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent3: The cat minueted around the room, mimicking a dancer.
meanings.sent4: The leaves minueted in the wind, creating a beautiful dance.
meanings.sent5: The children minueted joyfully in the garden, their laughter filling the air.

meanings.sent1: I found an old minueted sheet music in the attic.
meanings.sent2: The minueted was a popular dance in the 18th century.
meanings.sent3: The antique shop had a collection of minueteds on display.
meanings.sent4: The minueted brought back memories of elegant balls and grandeur.
meanings.sent5: The minueted was beautifully preserved in the historical museum.
